(After spelling IGL Regular League out, Intergalactic Gladiatorial League 
Regular League, I realized that is pretty sad looking.  So instead of of 
Regular League and Gestalt League, it will be Regular Division and Gestalt 
Division.

So it will be IGL Regular Division & and IGL Gestalt Division, which is much, 
much better looking and sounding.


Thanks)
